import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react' import Navbar from './Navbar' import Pic from './Pic' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import productcontext from '../context/Productcontext' export default function Success() { const{getorder,order,spinner,setspinner}=useContext(productcontext) useEffect(()=>{ getorder() },[]) return ( <> { order.length ===setspinner(true)? "" :
Your order has been placed

Order Id.

{order.length ===0 ?"":order[0]._id }

Total

{order.length === 0 ? "": order[order.length-1].total }

Continue Shopping
} ) }
